data.title: List of Endowed Scholarships
data.text:
​​​150 for 150 Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2015 in honor of AUB's 150th anniversary, this fund supports students who demonstrate financial need.

A. Karim and Soraya El Cheikh Endowed Scholarship

Established in March 2021 to support students in financial need. ​​

A. Sayour-Greek Orthodox Scholarship

Established in the mid-1950s to support a Greek Orthodox woman student who demonstrates financial need.

A.G. Massabki Scholarship

Established in 1978 and supports students who demonstrate financial need pursuing their medical degrees at the Faculty of Medicine.

A.M. Rabbat Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1989 to support students at the Faculty of Arts and Sciences, Maroun Semaan Faculty of Engineering and Architecture, and/or the Suliman S. Olayan School of Business.

Abdallah and Samia Tamari Foundation Endowed Scholarship

Established in July 2019 by HE Mr. Tammam Salam to support Lebanese and Palestinian students who demonstrate financial need.

Abdallah Youssef Lahoud Endowed Scholarship

Established in January 2012 to honor the life and memory of the late Abdallah Lahoud, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Abdul Ghani and Inayat Hammour Endowed Scholarship

Established in October 2009 to support Lebanese and Syrian students who demonstrate financial need, have good academic standing, and are studying engineering, preferably chemical or petroleum engineering.

Abdul Mohsen Al-Qattan Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1989 by Abdul Mohsen Al-Qattan to support Palestinians students. Trustee Al-Qattan is the founder and chairman of the A.M. Qattan Foundation, one of the leading cultural and educational institutions in the Arab world.

Abdullah Osseiran Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1972 by the friends of Abdullah Adil Osseiran after his tragic and untimely death, this fund supports students from South Lebanon who demonstrate financial need.

Aghnie Farouk Abi Rafeh Endowed Scholarship

Established in December 2023 to support female Druze students majoring in a STEM field who demonstrate financial need and are in good academic standing​.

Agnes Varis Endowed Scholarship

Established in August 2017 by the Agnes Varis Trust to support students who demonstrate financial need pursuing their degrees in the sciences.

Ahmad Abdul Jabbar Endowed Scholarship Fund

Established in October 2004 by Maha, Lina, and Rima Abdul Jabbar, the daughters of Ahmad Abdul Jabbar, a renowned diplomat, as a surprise to him, the scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Ahmad and Shirine El Khatib Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2015 to support students who demonstrate financial need, with a priority for Palestinian students.

Ahmad S. El-Khalidy Endowed Scholarship

Established in April 1956 by the Board of Trustees in memory of Ahmad S. El-Khalidy, this scholarship supports Palestinian students who demonstrate financial need studying in the Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

Ahmad S. Zaabri Endowed Scholarship

Established in March 2013 in honor of Ahmad Al Zaabri, an AUB alumnus (BA '00) to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Ahmad Shamsuddin Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Established in May 2001 by the Shamsuddin family and a group of colleagues, friends, and students of the late Professor Ahmad Shamsuddin, the scholarship supports high-achieving students who demonstrate financial need majoring in computer science.

Aida Ashur Hannun Endowed Scholarship

Established in January 2019 by Dr. Yusuf Hannun to support Palestinian women students who demonstrate financial need and are majoring in either mathematics or computer science.

Albert and Loreen Rihani Endowed Scholarship

Established in July 2020 by May Rihani to support students who demonstrate financial need pursuing their studies at the Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

Ali Ghandour Endowed Scholarship

Established in August 2003 to honor the late Ali Ghandour, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Alice and Brahim Fuleihan Scholarship

Established in 2005 to support students who demonstrate financial need and are in good academic standing.​

Alice Michael Endowed Scholarship

Established in December 2022 to support students of Assyrian origin who demonstrate financial need and are in good academic standing.​

Alsaad General Contracting Endowed Scholarship

Established in August 2010 by Alsaad General Contracting to support students who demonstrate financial need studying civil engineering.

Alumni Class Reunion Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2003 and supported by funds raised during class reunions, this scholarship supports children of alumni who demonstrate financial need.

Amal and Farouk K. Jabre Endowed Scholarship Fund

​Established in July 2005 in honor of Trsutee Farouk Jabre and his wife Amal, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Andre Antoine Merab Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2017 by Trustee Jacques P. Merab in memory of Andre Antoine Merab, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Andre Dirlik and Raja Ghandour Endowed Scholarship

Established in November 2022 to support female students who demonstrate financial need and are in good academic standing.​

Angela Jurdak Khoury Endowed Scholarship

Established in April 2017 by Chair Philip Khoury to support undergraduate students who demonstrate financial need.

Angela Jurdak Khoury Endowed Scholarship Fund

Established in April 2017 to support undergraduate students who demonstrate financial need.

Anis B. & Mima Malouf Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1955 by the Malouf family to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Anis Bibi Endowed Scholarship

Established in December 2019 by Muwaffak Bibi to support Palestinian students who demonstrate financial need pursuing their studies at the Suliman S. Olayan School of Business.

Annette and Nabil Habayeb Endowed Scholarship

Established in December 2019 by Trustee Nabil Habayeb to support students who demonstrate financial need pursuing their studies at the Maroun Semaan Faculty of Engineering and Architecture.

Anthony E. Mansour Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1990 by Anthony E. Mansour to support Palestinian students who demonstrate financial need.

Antoine Saad Hamra Memorial Endowed Scholarship Fund

Established in 2002 by the classmates, friends, and relatives of Antoine Hamra (BA Civil Engineering '77) to honor his memory by providing financial support to students from his hometown of Marja'youn.

Antoun Saadeh Endowed Scholarship

Established in October 2022 to support two students pursuing their studies at the Faculty of Arts and Sciences and majoring in education and computer science who demonstrate financial need and are in good academic standing.​

Arabia Insurance Nabih Faris Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2005, in honor of AUB Professor Nabih Faris, this scholarship supports undergraduate or graduate students who demonstrate financial need and are majoring in Middle East history, Arab studies, business administration, economics, computer and communications engineering, or mathematics.

Archak & Maroun Senekjian Scholarship Fund

Established in 1983 by Dr. Harry Seneca in the name of his parents, Archak and Maroun Senekjian, to support Armenian students who demonstrate financial need.

AREC '78 And Friends Endowed Scholarship Fund

Established in 1980 by the AREC '78 Committee to support agriculture students who demonstrate financial need and appreciate and participate in farm life during their stay at AREC.

AREC '80 Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2006 by the AREC '80 Committee in memory of classmates Sinan Kaysi-Farran, Diab Abou Jaoude, and Randa Smine, this scholarship supports students studying in the Faculty of Agricultural and Food Sciences.

​

AREC ’82 Endowed Fund

Established in May 2021 to support students at the Faculty of Agricultural and Food Sciences and research.​

Areen Projects Scholarship Fund

Established in 1982 by Areen to provide financial assistance to students who demonstrate financial need in the Maroun Semaan Faculty of Engineering and Architecture.

AUB Alumni Association of North America

Established in 1951 to support students who demonstrate financial need.

AUB Alumni At NPCC Abu Dhabi Scholarship

Established in 1990 by the National Petroleum Construction Company (NPCC) to provide scholarships to needy Lebanese or Palestinian students studying engineering or business administration.

AUB Alumni Development Scholarship

Established in 1996 by the Office of Development and funded from the sale of the Directory of Alumni 1866-1991 and the sale of Alumni Identification Cards, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

AUB Alumni Student Scholarship

Established in 1979 by the Office of Development to support students who demonstrate financial need.

AUB Fine & Performing Arts Endowed Fund

Established in 1971 to support students who demonstrate financial need majoring in the fine and performing arts.

AUB Scholarship Fundraising Committee Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1997 to raise funds designated for the support of the University Scholarship Program, the committee raises funds through various activities to support students who demonstrate financial need.

AUB Women Centennial Fund​

Established in March 2021 to celebrate the centennial of AUB's first femal students. This scholarship supports female students in financial need. ​

Awni Toukan Endowed Scholarship

Established in February 2020 by Dr. Khaled Toukan to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Azeez & Saleemeh Shaheen Scholarship Fund

Established in 1978 through the donation of stock shares by Azeez Shaheen, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Aznive Etinoff Memorial Scholarship

Established in 1982 by Nedko S. Etinoff in honor of his late wife, Aznive, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need, preferably of Bulgarian origin.

Bana Hilal Endowed Scholarship

Established in October 2019 by Bana Hilal to support students who demonstrate financial need.

BAPCO Endowed Scholarship

Originally established in September 1980 for other purposes, this fund became a scholarship fund in 2019. It supports Bahraini students at the Suliman S. Olayan School of Business who demonstrate financial need.

Barakat-Sawabini Endowed Scholarship Fund

Established in 2004 by George Barakat in honor of his parents, his late wife, and her parents and brother, this scholarship supports Arab students who demonstrate financial need, with a preference for Palestinian students.

Bashar Hassan Khayat Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2004 in honor of Bashar Hassan Khayat by his family, the scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Bliss Memorial Scholarship

Established in 1925, by Professor Jewett and his wife in honor of Dr. Daniel Bliss, the founder and first president of the Syrian Protestant College, which later became AUB, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Boodai Endowed Scholarship Fund

Established in 2004 to support students who demonstrate financial need.

C. R. Whittlesey Memorial Scholarship

Established in 1979 by Professor Jamshed K.S. Ghadi to honor the memory of C.R. Whittlesey, who was born in 1900 and spent three years at AUB (1921-24) teaching business and pursuing a master's degree in economics. The scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

C.R. Whittlesey Memorial Scholarship

Established in 1979 by Professor Jamshed K.S. Ghadi to honor the memory of C.R. Whittlesey, who was born in 1900 and spent three years at AUB (1921-24) teaching business and pursuing a master's degree in economics. The scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

C.V. Starr Endowed Scholarship Fund

Cornelius Vander Starr established the Starr Foundation in 1955. It has been a generous benefactor to many colleges and universities globally, this scholarship was established in 1997 by the foundation to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Charbel and Aida Tagher Family Endowed Scholarship

Established in November 2022 to support students who demonstrate financial need and are in good academic standing.​

Charles Hagopian Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1987 after the death of Charles Hagopian. This scholarship supports Lebanese- Armenian students who demonstrate financial need.

Charles Saleh and Mary Haddad Saleh Endowed Scholarship

Established in October 2019 by Charles and Mary Saleh to students who demonstrate financial need.

Chinyeh Hostler Endowed Scholarship

Established by Chinyeh Hostler, the widow of Charles Hostler, in August 2017 to support students who demonstrate financial need from either the US or the Far East.

Clapp-Constan Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1970 after the death of Eleanor Clapp who bequeathed part of her estate to AUB in honor of Professor Nicholas D. Constance, Department of Chemistry. This scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Class of MD 89 Endowed Scholarship

Established in December 2019 by the MD Class of 1989 to support medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Cleartag-Mirum Endowed Scholarship

Established in April 2017 by Tarek Dajani, the CEO and founder of the Cleartag-Mirum Company to support students who demonstrate financial need majoring in graphic design or computer science.

Computer Science Alumni Chapter Endowed Scholarship

Established in February 2018 to support undergraduate students who demonstrate financial need pursuing a degree in computer science.

Constantine Zurayk Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1952 by Marie El-Khoury in the name of Dr. Constantine Zurayk to support students who demonstrate financial need majoring in philosophy, political science, education, sociology, economics, or psychology.

Daniel & Emily Oliver Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1978 by the Daniel and Emily Oliver Orphanages in memory of Daniel and Emily Oliver, the scholarship supports promising Lebanese undergraduate women students who demonstrate financial need.

Daniel Bliss Scholarship

Established in 2000 by the Daniel Bliss Society in honor of Dr. Daniel Bliss, AUB's founder and first president, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

David A. Fuleihan Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1959, as stipulated in the will of David A. Fuleihan who bequeathed a portion of his estate to AUB to support students who demonstrate financial need.

David S. Dodge Arabic Fund

Established in 2010 in honor of David Dodge, the great-grandson of Daniel Bliss and son of President Bayard Dodge, who served as president of AUB from 1996 to 1997, this scholarship supports American students who demonstrate financial need.

David S. Dodge Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1998 in honor of David Dodge, the great-grandson of Daniel Bliss and son of President Bayard Dodge, who served as president of AUB from 1996 to 1997, this scholarship supports American students who demonstrate financial need.

Dean Lutfi Diab Endowed Scholarship

Established in November 2023 to support a Lebanese student majoring in the social sciences who demonstrates financial need and is in good academic standing. Preference will be for the top student from Marjaayoun majoring in psychology.​

Dean Robert Najemy Endowed Scholarship

Established in February 1976 during the memorial services for Dean Robert Najemy by his beloved family, friends, and colleagues, the scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Don and Nancy Mafrige Endowed Scholarship

Doris Dodge Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2002 in honor of Doris Dodge to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Dorothy H. Rogers Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1972 by Dr. William Lister Rogers in honor of his late wife, Dorothy, a prominent and devoted friend of the AUB community, and a member of the Board of Trustees, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Adnan and Mrs. Vesta Dajani Endowed Scholarship

Established in October 2018 by Dr. Adnan and Mrs. Vesta Dajani to support Palestinian students who demonstrate financial need with a preference for students pursuing degrees in nursing or medicine.

Dr. Afif and Mrs. Zamzam Abdulwahab Scholarship

Established in 2003 by the Abdulwahab family in honor of distinguished alumnus Dr. Afif Abdul Wahab to support students studying pre-medicine or medicine who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Albert Kuran Dubai Alumni Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2014 in honor of Dr. Albert Kuran by the WAAAUB Dubai and Northern Emirates Chapter to support students who demonstrate financial need pursuing a degree in the Maroun Semaan Faculty of Engineering and Architecture.

Dr. Ali and Rima Bazarbachi Endowed Scholarship

Established in July 2020 by Dr. Ali Bazarbachi to support medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Antoine Zahlan Endowed Scholarship

Established in February 2023 to support one Palestinian or Lebanese student pursuing undergraduate studies in physics or chemistry who demonstrates financial need and is in good academic standing.​

Dr. Dimitri Bitar Endowed Scholarship Fund

Dr. Fadlo Raji Abu-Haydar Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2005 by Dr. Fadlo Abu-Haydar, an associate professor of internal medicine and AUB graduate (MD '52), to support students studying in the Faculty of Medicine.

Dr. Fady and Mrs. Roula Dalloul Sharara Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2009 by Dr. Fady and Mrs. Roula Dalloul Sharara to provide financial support to two medical students who demonstrate financial need. Dr. Fady Sharara, the founder and medical director for the Virginia Center for Reproductive Medicine (VCRM), headquartered in Reston, VA, earned his BS (1982) and MD (1986) degrees at AUB.

Dr. Farahe Maloof Medical Endowed Scholarship

Established by Dr. Maloof, who was awarded the Said Akl Prize in 1963 after giving two lectures at AUB based on his research and experiments for the diagnosis and treatment of different diseases that affect the thyroid gland. Upon his return to Boston, Maloof and the Cedars Club, a group of Lebanese individuals residing in Boston, provided the funds to establish the scholarship, which helps support medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Farouk S. Idriss Endowed Medical Scholarship

Established in 1999 by Lorrain Idriss Ball on behalf of her late husband, Dr. Farouk S. Idriss, BS, MD, this scholarship supports Lebanese medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Fawzi N. Abu-Jamra Endowed Scholarship

Established in July 2023 to support students who demonstrate financial need and are in good academic standing.​

Dr. Fuad and Alice Trabulsi Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1992 by Dr. Fuad and Mrs. Alice Trabulsi, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Fuad Rafidi and Dr. Sawsan Barakat Endowed Scholarship

Established in December 2023 to support students who demonstrate financial need and are in good academic standing.​

Dr. Gebran and Mrs. Salma Farah Endowed Scholarship Fund

Established in 2007 by Dr. Gebran M. Farah in his name and that of his late wife, Salma Farah, to provide scholarships to Lebanese nursing students who excel academically and demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Georges Fakhoury Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1998 to support the tuition of students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Harry G. Dorman Scholarship

Established in 1962 by the Dorman family in honor of their father, Dr. Harry G. Dorman. The Dormans have strong ties to Lebanon, and especially to AUB. This scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Jamil Karsh Endowed Scholarship

Established in October 2018 through a bequest from Dr. Jamil Karsh to support medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Jean Moadie Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2003 from the estate of alumnus and scholarship recipient Dr. Jean Moadie (BA '43, MD '47) in recognition and appreciation of the support he received, this scholarship supports medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. John I. Makhoul Endowed Scholarship

Established in April 2023 to support students pursuing their studies at the Maroun Semaan Faculty of Engineering and Architecture who demonstrate financial need and are in good academic standing.​

Dr. John I. Mirhij Scholarship

Established in 1992 by Dr. Mirhji's daughter, Dr. Najwa Mirhji-Shammas, and her husband Dr. Hanna Shammas in honor of her father who was a professor and chairman of the Department of Biology, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need from Dhour El-Chwair.

Dr. Joseph Yammine Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1981 by Dr. Joseph Yammine, the "moral loan," as Dr. Yammine called it, supports Lebanese students who demonstrate financial need from the Mount Lebanon area.

Dr. Marcel and Jane Saghir Endowed Scholarship Fund

Established in December 2021 to be awarded to Lebanese students from Amioun/Koura pursuing their studies at the Faculty of Health Sciences.

​

Dr. Maurice H. Bisharat Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1999 and awarded to medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Michael A. Shadid Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1958 by alumnus Dr. Michael Shadid to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Mohamad and Nada Haidar Endowed Scholarship

Established in July 2020 by Dr. Mohamad Haidari to support medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Mohammad Chatah Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2014 by Dr. Nadim Mounla and his friends in honor of the life, legacy, and memory of alumnus Dr. Mohammad Chatah, the scholarship supports undergraduate Lebanese students from North Lebanon who demonstrate financial need, excel academically, and are pursing degrees in economics, international relations, political science, or public administration.

Dr. Mohammad Yaghi Endowed Scholarship

Established in April 2021 to support students in financial need.​

Dr. Muhammad Hijazi and Mrs. Nuha Mikdashi Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2012 by Nuha Mikdashi in honor of her late husband and AUB alumnus Dr. Muhammad Hijazi, this scholarship supports students, with a preference for orphans.

Dr. Nada T. Kobeissi Endowed Scholarship

Dr. Naji Sahyoun Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2003 by the friends and loved ones of distinguished alumnus Dr. Naji Sahyoun, the scholarship supports medical students who demonstrate financial need and excel academically.

Dr. Osama Elansari Endowed Scholarship

Established in September 2013 by Lana Elansari and her sisters in honor of the life and memory of their parents, Dr. Osama Elansari and Mrs. Ibtissam Akkad Elansari, the scholarship supports Syrian students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Randa Antoun Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2014 by the Antoun family in memory of the late Dr. Randa Antoun, AUB professor, the scholarship supports students who are majoring in political studies or public administration at the Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

Dr. Robert A. Chahine Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2020, this endowed scholarship fund supports needy and qualified Lebanese medical students, preferably from the region of Akkar. It is named for Dr. Robert A. Chahine (MD ’66), who had a prominent academic career in the US and in Lebanon where he served as dean of the Lebanese University Medical School.

Dr. Saad Hamdi AlZaim and Family Endowed Scholarship

Established in January 2020 by Omar and Alma AlZaim to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Said H. Sayegh Endowed Scholarship

Established in September 2020 by Dr. Mohammad H. Sayegh in honor of his late brother, Dr. Said H. Sayegh, to support students who demonstrate financial need at the Faculty of Medicine.​

Dr. Salim Musalli Pasha Scholarship

Established by Dr. Salim Musalli Pasha who bequeathed a sum of money to AUB to create an endowment to provide scholarships to students who demonstrate financial need. After graduating from SPC (AUB) in 1875, Dr. Salim Musalli Pasha went on to study medicine in America.

Dr. Sami Kabbani Endowed Scholarship

Established in January 2018 by Dr. Nader Kabbani to support Syrian medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Samia J. Khoury and Dr. Mohamed H. Sayegh Endowed Scholarship

Established in August 2017 by Dr. Samia J. Khoury and Dr. Mohamed H. Sayegh to support the tuition of medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Samuel White Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1960 by Dr. Samuel E. White (Waheed) to support Lebanese students who demonstrate financial need. In addition to establishing a scholarship, Dr. White and his wife bequeathed their entire estate to support this endowment.

Dr. William Carslaw Memorial Scholarship

Established in 1926 to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Yakub Inati Scholarship

Established in 1982 by the family of Dr. Yakub Inati, this scholarship benefits Lebanese medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Dr. Yusuf K. Hitti Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1979 from the proceeds from the Hitti Medical Dictionary, this scholarship supports medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Drs. Abdullah and Daoud Sulaiman Kassir Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Established in December 2017 by Nabil Kassir to support Iraqi students who demonstrate financial need.

Drs. Adel and Larry Anna Afifi Endowed Scholarship

Established in October 2022 to support Palestinian students pursuing their studies at the Faculty of Medicine and the Faculty of Health Sciences who demonstrate financial need and are in good academic standing.​

Dunia Foundation Endowed Scholarship

Established in June 2024 to support Lebanese students who demonstrate financial need and are in good academic standing.​

E. Maxine Bruhns Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2006 by E. Maxine Bruhns to support Palestinian students who demonstrate financial need. Bruhns completed her MA in education at AUB in 1945. She and her husband then returned to the US where she worked as the director of Nationality Rooms and Intercultural Exchange Programs at the University of Pittsburgh.

Eileen Page Medical Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1974 by AUB Trustee Howard W. Page and his wife, Mrs. Eileen Page, who came from a family of medical professionals, this scholarship supports medical students who demonstrate financial need.

Eissa A. Bateh and Brothers Foundation Scholarship

Established in 1971 by Eissa A. Bateh to support Palestinian students who demonstrate financial need.

Elias A. Husni Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2000 by Dr. Elias Husni to help exceptional students from North Lebanon who demonstrate financial need.

Elias and Shirine Matta Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2004 by the Matta family, specifically Nadim, Shirine, and Khalil, the children of Fadil Khalil Matta this scholarship supports students from Bhamdoun who demonstrate financial need. The Matta family has strong ties to AUB: both Fadil and his son Nadim are AUB graduates.

Elie Khalil Khouri Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2015 by Elie Khoury to support students who demonstrate financial need pursuing a degree in media studies.

Elissar Farah and Assaad Antonios Endowed Scholarship

Established in April 2020 by Mr. Assaad and Mrs. Elissar Antonios to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Elsa and Stanley Kerr Scholarship

Established in 1985 by Elsa Kerr who bequeathed funds from her estate to AUB to establish a scholarship fund to support nursing students who demonstrate financial need. Kerr left a note attached to her will stating that she wanted the scholarship to support nursing students in honor of her sister, Laura Reckman, who spent her lifetime in nursing and nursing education.

Emile and Helen Chartouni Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2010 by Nabil Chartouni in honor of his parents, Emile and Helen Chartouni, to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Emile and Helen Murr Dabaghi Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2002 by Alexander T. Ercklentz in the name of his parents, Enno and Hildegard Ercklentz, the scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need. Ercklentz has been a trustee emeritus since 2012 and trustee since 1989.

Fadil and Nijmeh Khalil Matta Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2004 by the Matta family, specifically Nadim, Shirine, and Khalil, the children of Fadil Khalil Matta this scholarship supports students from Bhamdoun who demonstrate financial need. The Matta family has strong ties to AUB: both Fadil and his son Nadim are AUB graduates.

Fadwa Nassif Taleb Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1988 by Dr. Nazih J. Taleb, Dar Al Handasah Nazih Taleb and Partners, in honor of his mother, Fadwa Nassif Taleb, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need studying in the Maroun Semaan Faculty of Engineering and Architecture.

FAFS 50Th Anniversary Graduate Student Endowed Fund

Established in 2002 by the FAFS 50th Anniversary Committee, and funded by the generosity of friends and alumni, this scholarship supports graduate students who demonstrate financial need studying in the Faculty of Agricultural and Food Sciences.

Faisal AlMutawa Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1990 by Faisal AlMutawa to support students who demonstrate financial need studying at the Suliman S. Olayan School of Business.

Farid I. Haurani Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2016 as stipulated in the last will and testament of Dr. Farid I. Haurani, this scholarship supports Palestinian, Lebanese, or American students who demonstrate financial need.

Farid Sa'd Graduate Endowed Scholarship in Science-Technology

Established in 1968 by AUB graduate Farid Sa'd to support Arab students studying science or technology.

Faris S. Malouf Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1958 by the Syrian and Lebanese American Federation to honor Faris Malouf, one of its most distinguished leaders, the scholarship supports exceptional students from Arab countries who demonstrate financial need.

Farouk and Amal Jabre Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2016 by Trustee Farouk Jabre and his wife Amal to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Farouk Kamal Endowed Scholarship

Established in April 2019 by Farouk Kamal to support students who demonstrate financial need with a preference for those enrolled at the Suliman S. Olayan School of Business.

Farouk W. Agha Scholarship

Established in 1988 by Farouk W. Agha to support students who demonstrate financial need pursuing degrees in engineering, medicine, agriculture, health sciences, or nursing.

Fatima Hamdan Daher Endowed Scholarship

The Fatima Hamdan Daher Endowed Scholarship honors the enduring love and guidance of a cherished mother. This endowed scholarship supports needy Lebanese students excelling in their studies​.

Fawwaz Ulaby and Jean Cunningham Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2015 by alumnus Dr. Fawwaz Ulaby (BS Physics '64) to support undergraduate students majoring in physics who demonstrate financial need.

Fawzi and Lili Farah Endowed Scholarship

Established in September 2019 by Fawzi E. Farah to support students who demonstrate financial need.

Fingerprints Endowed Scholarship Fund

Established in 2002 by students for students, Fingerprints is a program organized by the Office of Development in close coordination with the Office of the Dean of Student Affairs. The goal of the Fingerprints Program is to encourage graduating students to become involved alumni who support their alma mater. This scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Francois and Jill S Hamze Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2015 by Francois Hamze to support students who demonstrate financial need with a priority for students from Tripoli and North Lebanon.

Frank H. Teagle, Jr. Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2013, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Friends of the AUB Museum Endowed Scholarship-in honor of Dr. Leila Badre

Established in June 2020 by the Society of the Friends of the AUB Museum in honor of former AUB Museum Director, Dr. Leila Badre, to support students who demonstrate financial need majoring in archaeology.

Fuad and Noha Hamzeh Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1964 by Fuad Es-Said (BA '28), a successful businessman, most notably in the management of the Jordanian Tobacco and Cigarette Company and the Jordanian Refinery Co., this scholarship supports Lebanese male students pursuing degrees at either the Maroun Semaan Faculty of Engineering and Architecture, the Suliman S. Olayan School of Business, or the Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

Fuad Muhsin Afnan Memorial Fund

Established in 1971 by Dr. Soheil Afnan (BA '23) in honor of his younger brother, Fuad Muhsin Afnan, who died during the London Blitz in World War II, this scholarship supports Baha'i students who demonstrate financial need.

Fuad Nakhleh Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1989 by Fuad Nakhleh, this scholarship supports students who demonstrate financial need.

Gaza Endowed Scholarship

Established in 1971 to support students who demonstrate financial need.

General Wissam Al Hassan Endowed Scholarship in Computer and Communication Engineering

Established in November 2018 by the Wissam Al Hassan Foundation to support students who demonstrate financial need with a preference for those enrolled at the Maroun Semaan Faculty of Engineering and Architecture majoring in computer and communications engineering.

General-Centennial

Established in 1966 in honor of the University's Centennial Anniversary in 1966, to support students who demonstrate financial need.

George and Alexandra Fattouh Endowed Scholarship

Established in 2014 by George Fattouh and his wife Alexandra, the scholarship supports the tuition of Lebanese students who demonstrate financial need, are in good academic standing, and are pursuing their undergraduate degrees in business at the Suliman S. Olayan School of Business.

George Faris Memorial Scholarship
